mapper.select: select a.*,b.realname,b.img from wk_crm_action_record a join wk_admin_user b on a.create_user_id = b.user_id where action_id = #{actionId} and types = #{types} and content is not null and content != '' order by create_time desc
select a.field_id, value,b.field_name,b.name from ${data.dataTableName} as a left join wk_crm_field b on a.field_id = b.field_id where batch_id = #{data.batchId} and b.field_name is not null
